category.name: Full Text Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_fts_fsf_host
preference.preference_description: Specifies the IP address or the name of the host machine on which Autonomy File System Fetch is running. The host and port specified by the TC_fts_fsf_port preference are used by the FTS to send the import command to File System Fetch, which imports and indexes documents on the IDOL server. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Must be a valid IP address or host name.
